NOTE 1: The AVA of Cameronians replaces totally or partially the AVA of the Dog-Warriors.

NOTE 2: It can not be more than 2 Dog-Warrior like troop in a General army (except Personalities).

NOTE 3: Then, in an Ariadnian army there can be: 2 Dog-Warriors, or 1 Dog-Warrior and 1 Cameronian, or 2 Cameronians (Personalities are not counted).

perfiles.notas:
Note: The AVA of all 112 units is shared, so there can be a maximum of two 112s (any unit) in the Army List.

Example: Two 112s (Motorized); or one 112 (Motorized) one 112; or two 112s.

perfiles.notas:
Note: The AVA of all 112 units is shared, so there can be a maximum of two 112s (any unit) in the Army List.

Example: Two 112s (Motorized); or one 112 (Motorized) one 112; or two 112s.

The 112 (Motorized) cannot be part of a Fireteam.
